# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $100 by many of our customers. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. For you, I am offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $95. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece worth more than what you're paying for! Please let me know if you're interested. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer
